description: This file defines an API router for v1 of a web service using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for health checks and CRUD operations for tasks, interacting with a MongoDB backend.

classes.name: HealthOut
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the health status response including optional MongoDB connectivity info

methods.name: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] _get_db()
methods.description: Helper function to obtain the MongoDB database instance if available

methods.name: HealthOut health_v1()
methods.description: Endpoint to check service health and MongoDB connectivity status

methods.name: List[TaskOut] list_tasks( limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of tasks to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of tasks to skip"), db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list tasks with pagination support

methods.name: TaskOut create_task( payload: TaskCreate, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new task

methods.name: TaskOut get_task( task_id: str, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a task by its ID

methods.name: TaskOut update_task( task_id: str, payload: TaskUpdate, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to partially update a task by its ID

methods.name: dict delete_task( task_id: str, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a task by its ID

ctags.name: list_tasks
ctags.signature: ( limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of tasks to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of tasks to skip"), db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )

ctags.name: mongodb_configured
ctags.pattern: /^    mongodb_configured: bool = Field(..., description="Whether MONGODB_URI is configured")$/

ctags.name: mongodb_ok
ctags.pattern: /^    mongodb_ok: bool = Field(..., description="Whether MongoDB is reachable (ping) when configur/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: str = Field(..., description="Overall service status")$/

ctags.name: update_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: str, payload: TaskUpdate, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
